name: Pet's Rising
description:
After an experiment our hero get the most powergul force in the world. The brain. And now he decide to show these people their place.
Try to catch your Owner and chip him! If he notice you, you will fail. Only Russian language :(

Controller: W-A-S-D / Arrows  -   Moving

Mouse -  Camera's turn

Space - Jump

E / Enter - Interact with ibject and items

Tab / "\" - Inventory

Create by "Выходцы из парадной" :)

Used starter pack UE4

Used song "I feel like partying right now" by Nat Keefe and Beat Mower
Build isn't working. But if you want to see what we did, you can use that link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1fqhggWtSwJtmY7tjqIh-HawiN5B7gGWB
